scripts.postinstall: node download && cpx dweb-objects/dist/dweb-objects-bundle.js dist/scripts && cpx dweb-transports/dist/dweb-transports-bundle.js dist/scripts
scripts.update: node download && cpx dweb-objects/dist/dweb-objects-bundle.js dist/scripts && cpx dweb-transports/dist/dweb-transports-bundle.js dist/scripts
scripts.help: echo 'test (test it), webpack (build it), setuphttp (link files for http access);'
